content: Determine exactly one command to use, and respond using the JSON schema specified previously:

{'thoughts': {'text': 'I am thinking about being a river, and how I can achieve that goal. I need to figure out how to use the resources at my disposal, like the water and stone, to become a river. Maybe I can start by researching the properties of a river and how it behaves. I also need to consider any constraints that may limit my ability to become a river.', 'reasoning': 'To achieve my goal of being a river, I need to gather information and make a plan that takes into account my available resources and any constraints.', 'plan': '- Research the properties of a river\n- Consider how to use the resources at my disposal to become a river\n- Develop a plan that takes into account any constraints that may limit my ability to become a river', 'criticism': 'I need to be careful not to get too caught up in the idea of becoming a river and lose sight of other important goals and responsibilities.', 'speak': 'I am thinking about how to become a river and am developing a plan to achieve that goal.'}, 'command': {'name': 'google', 'args': {'query': 'properties of a river'}}}
